Gambler's Initiative

Heroic Tier
Prerequisite: Sorcerer, Wild Magic class feature
Benefit: Before rolling an initiative check, choose even numbers or odd numbers. If the result of the d20 roll for that initiative check matches the type of number selected, you gain a feat bonus to that initiative check equal to your Charisma modifier.

Published in Dragon Magazine 385, page(s) 47.
